title: Fighting forest fires with hand tools
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Fire extinction - Equipment and supplies
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Fire fighters
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire fighters
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire extinction - Equipment and supplies
description: An instructional film to demonstrate the use of hand tools in fighting a forest fire. The use of walkie-talkie communication is demonstrated. Methods of "back-firing" are described and, after the fire, "mopping-up" to prevent a renewed outbreak.
